meanings.definition: A container that keeps liquids hot or cold for an extended period of time.
meanings.sent1: I brought a thermos of hot chocolate to school.
meanings.sent2: My mom packed my lunch with a thermos of soup.
meanings.sent3: The thermos kept the coffee warm during the long meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her love was a thermos, always keeping me warm.
meanings.sent5: The thermos, like a magic bottle, preserved the heat of the tea.

meanings.definition: To place a liquid in a thermos to keep it at a desired temperature.
meanings.sent1: I thermosed the coffee before heading out.
meanings.sent2: She thermoses her water before going for a run.
meanings.sent3: He thermosed the soup for his picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: They thermos their drinks for the road trip.
meanings.sent5: Thermosing the tea, she ensured it stayed hot for hours.
